pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Energy Overloaders target a single tile and deal 1 damage to it. If there is an $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)Energy Shield/$ protecting that tile, it will be destroyed and the tile will still be damaged!

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)This ability is THE best counter against energy shields! Should you ever encounter an Energy Shield and you have this ability, you'll be able to completely nullify it.$(li)Try to avoid wasting energy overloaders on unprotected tiles, or else you might suddenly find yourself out of uses against a high HP energy shield.
